00121 BOOLEAN EnterFuneral()
00122 {
00123   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00124       UINT16                              usPosX, i;
00125 
00126       // load the Closed graphic and add it
00127       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00128       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_CLOSED );
00129       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiClosedSign));
00130 
00131       // load the Left column graphic and add it
00132       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00133       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\LeftColumn.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00134       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiLeftColumn));
00135 
00136       // load the Link carving graphic and add it
00137       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00138       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\LinkCarving.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00139       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiLinkCarving));
00140 
00141       // load the Marble graphic and add it
00142       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00143       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\Marble.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00144       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMarbleBackground));
00145 
00146       // load the McGillicuttys sign graphic and add it
00147       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00148       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_MCGILLICUTTYS );
00149       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMcGillicuttys));
00150 
00151       // load the Mortuary  graphic and add it
00152       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00153       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_MORTUARY );
00154       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiMortuary));
00155 
00156       // load the right column graphic and add it
00157       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00158       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\RightColumn.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00159       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiRightColumn));
00160 
00161 
00162       usPosX = FUNERAL_LINK_1_X;
00163       for(i=0; i<FUNERAL_NUMBER_OF_LINKS; i++)
00164       {
00165             //Mouse region for the bottom links
00166 
00167             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedFuneralLinkRegion[i], usPosX, FUNERAL_LINK_1_Y, (UINT16)(usPosX + FUNERAL_LINK_1_WIDTH), (UINT16)(FUNERAL_LINK_1_Y + FUNERAL_LINK_1_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00168                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectFuneralLinkRegionCallBack ); 
00169             MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedFuneralLinkRegion[i]); 
00170             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedFuneralLinkRegion[i], 0, i );   
00171 
00172             usPosX += FUNERAL_LINK_OFFSET_X;
00173       }
00174 
00175       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedRipSignRegion, FUNERAL_CLOSED_RIP_SIGN_X, FUNERAL_CLOSED_RIP_SIGN_Y, (UINT16)(FUNERAL_CLOSED_RIP_SIGN_X + FUNERAL_CLOSED_WIDTH), (UINT16)(FUNERAL_CLOSED_RIP_SIGN_Y + FUNERAL_CLOSED_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+1,
00176                                      CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectRipSignRegionCallBack ); 
00177       MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedRipSignRegion); 
00178   MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedRipSignRegion); 
00179 
00180 
00181       SetBookMark( FUNERAL_BOOKMARK );
00182 
00183       return( TRUE );
00184 
00185 }
00186 
00187 void ExitFuneral()
00188 {
00189       UINT8 i;
00190 
00191       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiClosedSign);
00192       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiLeftColumn);
00193       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiLinkCarving);
00194       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMarbleBackground);
00195       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMcGillicuttys);
00196       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiMortuary);
00197       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiRightColumn);
00198 
00199       for(i=0; i<FUNERAL_NUMBER_OF_LINKS; i++)
00200       {
00201         MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedFuneralLinkRegion[i]);
00202       }
00203 
00204       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedRipSignRegion );
00205 }

00212 void RenderFuneral()
00213 {
00214   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00215       UINT16 i, usPosX, usStringHeight;
00216 
00217       WebPageTileBackground(4, 4, FUNERAL_MARBLE_WIDTH, FUNERAL_MARBLE_HEIGHT, guiMarbleBackground);
00218 
00219       // LeftColumn
00220       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiLeftColumn);
00221       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,FUNERAL_LEFT_COLUMN_X, FUNERAL_LEFT_COLUMN_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00222 
00223       // Mcgillicuttys
00224       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiMcGillicuttys);
00225       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,FUNERAL_MCGILICUTTYS_SIGN_X, FUNERAL_MCGILICUTTYS_SIGN_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00226 
00227       // Mortuary
00228       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiMortuary);
00229       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,FUNERAL_MORTUARY_SIGN_X, FUNERAL_MORTUARY_SIGN_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00230 
00231       // right column
00232       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiRightColumn);
00233       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,FUNERAL_RIGHT_COLUMN_X, FUNERAL_RIGHT_COLUMN_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00234 
00235 
00236             // LinkCarving
00237       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiLinkCarving);
00238 
00239       usPosX = FUNERAL_LINK_1_X;
00240       for(i=0; i<FUNERAL_NUMBER_OF_LINKS; i++)
00241       {
00242             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,usPosX, FUNERAL_LINK_1_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00243 
00244             //Calculate the height of the string, as it needs to be vertically centered.
00245             usStringHeight = IanWrappedStringHeight( 0, 0, FUNERAL_LINK_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, 
00246                                                                                            FUNERAL_SENTENCE_FONT, 0, sFuneralString[i+FUNERAL_SEND_FLOWERS], 
00247                                                                                            0, 0, 0 );
00248             DisplayWrappedString( (UINT16)(usPosX+FUNERAL_LINK_TEXT_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(FUNERAL_LINK_1_Y + (FUNERAL_LINK_1_HEIGHT - usStringHeight) / 2), FUNERAL_LINK_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_FONT, FUNERAL_TITLE_COLOR, sFuneralString[i+FUNERAL_SEND_FLOWERS], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00249 
00250 
00251             usPosX += FUNERAL_LINK_OFFSET_X;
00252       }
00253 
00254       //display all the sentences
00255 
00256       // sentence 1
00257       DisplayWrappedString(FUNERAL_SENTENCE_1_X, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_1_Y, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_WIDTH, 2, FUNERAL_TITLE_FONT, FUNERAL_TITLE_COLOR, sFuneralString[FUNERAL_INTRO_1], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00258 
00259       SetFontShadow( FUNERAL_SENTENCE_SHADOW_COLOR );
00260 
00261       // sentence 2
00262       DisplayWrappedString(FUNERAL_SENTENCE_2_X, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_2_Y, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_WIDTH, 2, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_FONT, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_COLOR, sFuneralString[FUNERAL_INTRO_2], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00263 
00264       // sentence 3
00265       DisplayWrappedString(FUNERAL_SENTENCE_3_X, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_3_Y, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_WIDTH, 2, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_FONT, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_COLOR, sFuneralString[FUNERAL_INTRO_3], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00266 
00267       // sentence 4
00268       DisplayWrappedString(FUNERAL_SENTENCE_4_X, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_4_Y, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_WIDTH, 2, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_FONT, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_COLOR, sFuneralString[FUNERAL_INTRO_4], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00269 
00270       // sentence 5
00271       DisplayWrappedString(FUNERAL_SENTENCE_5_X, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_5_Y, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_WIDTH, 2, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_FONT, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_COLOR, sFuneralString[FUNERAL_INTRO_5], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00272 
00273       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
00274 
00275 
00276   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00277       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00278   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00279 }

00281 
00282 void DisplayFuneralRipTombStone()
00283 {
00284   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00285 
00286       // rip tombstone
00287       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiClosedSign);
00288       BltVideoObjectOutlineShadowFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiClosedSign, 0, FUNERAL_CLOSED_RIP_SIGN_X+5, FUNERAL_CLOSED_RIP_SIGN_Y+5);
00289       BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,FUNERAL_CLOSED_RIP_SIGN_X, FUNERAL_CLOSED_RIP_SIGN_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00290 
00291       SetFontShadow( FUNERAL_RIP_SHADOW_COLOR );
00292 
00293       // sentence 10
00294       DisplayWrappedString(FUNERAL_RIP_SENTENCE_1_X, FUNERAL_RIP_SENTENCE_1_Y, FUNERAL_RIP_SENTENCE_WIDTH, 2, FUNERAL_SMALL_FONT, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_COLOR, sFuneralString[FUNERAL_OUR_CONDOLENCES], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);//FUNERAL_TITLE_FONT
00295 
00296       // sentence 11
00297       DisplayWrappedString(FUNERAL_RIP_SENTENCE_2_X, FUNERAL_RIP_SENTENCE_2_Y, FUNERAL_RIP_SENTENCE_WIDTH, 2, FUNERAL_SMALL_FONT, FUNERAL_SENTENCE_COLOR, sFuneralString[FUNERAL_OUR_SYMPATHIES], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00298 
00299       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
00300 
00301   InvalidateRegion(FUNERAL_CLOSED_RIP_SIGN_X,FUNERAL_CLOSED_RIP_SIGN_Y,  FUNERAL_CLOSED_RIP_SIGN_X+FUNERAL_CLOSED_WIDTH+5, FUNERAL_CLOSED_RIP_SIGN_Y+FUNERAL_CLOSED_HEIGHT+5);
00302 
00303       //enable the region to make the sign disappear
00304   MSYS_EnableRegion(&gSelectedRipSignRegion); 
00305 
00306 }

00308 
00309 void SelectFuneralLinkRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00310 { 
00311       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00312       {
00313 
00314       }
00315       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00316       {
00317             UINT32      uiUserData;
00318 
00319             uiUserData = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00320 
00321             if( uiUserData == 0 )
00322                   GoToWebPage( FLORIST_BOOKMARK );
00323             else
00324             {
00325                   RenderFuneral();
00326                   DisplayFuneralRipTombStone();
00327             }
00328 
00329       }
00330       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00331       {
00332       } 
00333 }
00334 
00335 void SelectRipSignRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00336 { 
00337       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00338       {
00339       }
00340       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00341       {
00342         MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedRipSignRegion); 
00343             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00344       }
00345       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00346       {
00347       } 
00348 }
